## Session Resumption

To continue this project in a new chat:
1. Say: "Let's continue the [Project] project. Read PROJECT_STATUS.md"
2. Claude reads `C:\Users\kirkm\Projects\[project-name]\PROJECT_STATUS.md`
3. Claude has Filesystem MCP access to `C:\Users\kirkm\Projects\[project-name]`
4. **Next task:** [What to do next]
